title: L’Intelligence artificielle en recherche
text:
Références







L’IA en recherche | 2025




Foisy, Laurence-Olivier M, Étienne Proulx, Hubert Cadieux, Jérémy Gilbert, Jozef Rivest, Alexandre Bouillon, and Yannick Dufresne. 2025. “Prompting the Machine: Introducing an LLM Data Extraction Method for Social Scientists.” Social Science Computer Review, 08944393251344865.


Lajeunesse, Sarah, Jessica Auchter, and Yannick Dufresne. 2025. “Bordering Vulnerability: Media Portrayal of Climate Migrants in Quebec’s Visual Narrative.” Howard Journal of Communications, 1–18.


Lemor, Antoine, Shannon Dinan, and Jérémy Gilbert. 2025. “LLM Tool: A Hybrid Pipeline for Automated Large-Scale Text Annotation Using Local Language Models and BERT Classifiers.” https://github.com/antoinelemor/LLM_Tool.
